======Threshold for low healing amount.======

= Description =

Percentage of marine's health to stop healing the amount set in <!--[asw_marine_health_regen_amount]-->[[asw_marine_health_regen_amount.wiki|asw_marine_health_regen_amount]] and start healing the amount set in <!--[asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low]-->[[asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low.wiki|asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low]].

Default value is 20%. Set to 0 to disable.
